Class Employee

java.lang.Object
Person
Employee
All Implemented Interfaces:
Locatable
public class Employee
extends Person
Employee class is a subclass of Person class which implements following properties: salary, delivery, employee no. This person can deliver deliveries between Customer objects and can work for a Company.
Version:
1.4, 07/03/2021
Author:
Tolga Ozgun
See Also:
Customer, Person, Delivery, Company

    Default constructor that accepts employee no and name

  • Constructor Details

    • Employee

      public Employee​(int employeeNo, java.lang.String name)
      Default constructor that accepts employee no and name
      Parameters:
      employeeNo - Integer value of employee no
      name - String value of name

  • Method Details

    • adjustSalary

      public void adjustSalary​(double value)
      Sets the salary of this employee
      Parameters:
      value - Double value of new salary.

    • getSalary

      public double getSalary()
      Returns the salary of this employee
      Returns:
      Double value of salary

    • getAvailability

      public boolean getAvailability()
      Checks if the current employee is available. Hence, can accept an another job.
      Returns:
      Boolean value of availability.

    • addJob

      public void addJob​(Item sendItem, Customer sender, Customer receiver, int packageNo)
      Adds a delivery job to this employee if they are available.
      Parameters:
      sendItem - Item object of the item to be sent
      sender - Customer object of the sender
      receiver - Customer object of the receiver
      packageNo - Integer value of the package no

    • deliverPackages

      public void deliverPackages()
      Employee delivers the packages they have in their job queue. Prints out information about deliveries.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overridden toString method with more information about the person. Also provides information of employee no, salary, availability, deliveries and current jobs.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Person
      Returns:
      String representation of this object
